description: Manage near-realtime metric alert rule dimensions.

commands.name: az monitor metrics alert dimension create
commands.summary: Build a metric alert rule dimension.
commands.syntax:
az monitor metrics alert dimension create --name
                                          --value
                                          [--op {Exclude, Include}]
examples: $dim = az monitor metrics alert dimension create -n dimName --op Include -v GetBlob PutBlob
